2558 default:
2559 break;
2560 }
2561 }
2562 }
2563 /* no valid addresses found */
2564 if (addr_locked == SCTP_ADDR_NOT_LOCKED)
2565 SCTP_IPI_ADDR_RUNLOCK();
2566 return (NULL);
2567}
2568
2569static struct sockaddr *
2570sctp_find_valid_localaddr_ep(struct sctp_tcb *stcb)
2571{
2572 struct sctp_laddr *laddr;
2573
2574 LIST_FOREACH(laddr, &stcb->sctp_ep->sctp_addr_list, sctp_nxt_addr) {
2575 if (laddr->ifa == NULL) {
2576 continue;
2577 }
2578 /* is the address restricted ? */
2579 if (sctp_is_addr_restricted(stcb, laddr->ifa) &&
2580 (!sctp_is_addr_pending(stcb, laddr->ifa)))
2581 continue;
2582
2583 /* found a valid local address to use */
2584 return (&laddr->ifa->address.sa);
2585 }
2586 /* no valid addresses found */
2587 return (NULL);
2588}
2589
2590/*
2591 * builds an ASCONF chunk from queued ASCONF params.
2592 * returns NULL on error (no mbuf, no ASCONF params queued, etc).
2593 */
2594struct mbuf *
2595sctp_compose_asconf(struct sctp_tcb *stcb, int *retlen, int addr_locked)
2596{
2597 struct mbuf *m_asconf, *m_asconf_chk;
2598 struct sctp_asconf_addr *aa;
2599 struct sctp_asconf_chunk *acp;
2600 struct sctp_asconf_paramhdr *aph;
2601 struct sctp_asconf_addr_param *aap;
2602 uint32_t p_length;
2603 uint32_t correlation_id = 1; /* 0 is reserved... */
2604 caddr_t ptr, lookup_ptr;
2605 uint8_t lookup_used = 0;
2606
2607 /* are there any asconf params to send? */
2608 TAILQ_FOREACH(aa, &stcb->asoc.asconf_queue, next) {
2609 if (aa->sent == 0)
2610 break;
2611 }
2612 if (aa == NULL)
2613 return (NULL);
2614
2615 /*
2616 * get a chunk header mbuf and a cluster for the asconf params since
2617 * it's simpler to fill in the asconf chunk header lookup address on
2618 * the fly
2619 */
2620 m_asconf_chk = sctp_get_mbuf_for_msg(sizeof(struct sctp_asconf_chunk), 0, M_NOWAIT, 1, MT_DATA);
2621 if (m_asconf_chk == NULL) {
2622 /* no mbuf's */
2623 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_ASCONF1,
2624 "sctp_compose_asconf: couldn't get chunk mbuf!\n");
2625 return (NULL);
2626 }
2627 m_asconf = sctp_get_mbuf_for_msg(MCLBYTES, 0, M_NOWAIT, 1, MT_DATA);
2628 if (m_asconf == NULL) {
2629 /* no mbuf's */
2630 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_ASCONF1,
2631 "sctp_compose_asconf: couldn't get mbuf!\n");
2632 sctp_m_freem(m_asconf_chk);
2633 return (NULL);
2634 }
2635 SCTP_BUF_LEN(m_asconf_chk) = sizeof(struct sctp_asconf_chunk);
2636 SCTP_BUF_LEN(m_asconf) = 0;
2637 acp = mtod(m_asconf_chk, struct sctp_asconf_chunk *);
2638 memset(acp, 0, sizeof(struct sctp_asconf_chunk));
2639 /* save pointers to lookup address and asconf params */
2640 lookup_ptr = (caddr_t)(acp + 1); /* after the header */
2641 ptr = mtod(m_asconf, caddr_t); /* beginning of cluster */
2642
2643 /* fill in chunk header info */
2644 acp->ch.chunk_type = SCTP_ASCONF;
2645 acp->ch.chunk_flags = 0;
2646 acp->serial_number = htonl(stcb->asoc.asconf_seq_out);
2647 stcb->asoc.asconf_seq_out++;
2648
2649 /* add parameters... up to smallest MTU allowed */
2650 TAILQ_FOREACH(aa, &stcb->asoc.asconf_queue, next) {
2651 if (aa->sent)
2652 continue;
2653 /* get the parameter length */
2654 p_length = SCTP_SIZE32(aa->ap.aph.ph.param_length);
2655 /* will it fit in current chunk? */
2656 if ((SCTP_BUF_LEN(m_asconf) + p_length > stcb->asoc.smallest_mtu) ||
2657 (SCTP_BUF_LEN(m_asconf) + p_length > MCLBYTES)) {
2658 /* won't fit, so we're done with this chunk */
2659 break;
2660 }
2661 /* assign (and store) a correlation id */
2662 aa->ap.aph.correlation_id = correlation_id++;
2663
2664 /*
2665 * fill in address if we're doing a delete this is a simple
2666 * way for us to fill in the correlation address, which
2667 * should only be used by the peer if we're deleting our
2668 * source address and adding a new address (e.g. renumbering
2669 * case)
2670 */
2671 if (lookup_used == 0 &&
2672 (aa->special_del == 0) &&
2673 aa->ap.aph.ph.param_type == SCTP_DEL_IP_ADDRESS) {
2674 struct sctp_ipv6addr_param *lookup;
2675 uint16_t p_size, addr_size;
2676
2677 lookup = (struct sctp_ipv6addr_param *)lookup_ptr;
2678 lookup->ph.param_type =
2679 htons(aa->ap.addrp.ph.param_type);
2680 if (aa->ap.addrp.ph.param_type == SCTP_IPV6_ADDRESS) {
2681 /* copy IPv6 address */
2682 p_size = sizeof(struct sctp_ipv6addr_param);
2683 addr_size = sizeof(struct in6_addr);
2684 } else {
2685 /* copy IPv4 address */
2686 p_size = sizeof(struct sctp_ipv4addr_param);
2687 addr_size = sizeof(struct in_addr);
2688 }
2689 lookup->ph.param_length = htons(SCTP_SIZE32(p_size));
2690 memcpy(lookup->addr, &aa->ap.addrp.addr, addr_size);
2691 SCTP_BUF_LEN(m_asconf_chk) += SCTP_SIZE32(p_size);
2692 lookup_used = 1;
2693 }
2694 /* copy into current space */
2695 memcpy(ptr, &aa->ap, p_length);
2696
2697 /* network elements and update lengths */
2698 aph = (struct sctp_asconf_paramhdr *)ptr;
2699 aap = (struct sctp_asconf_addr_param *)ptr;
2700 /* correlation_id is transparent to peer, no htonl needed */
2701 aph->ph.param_type = htons(aph->ph.param_type);
2702 aph->ph.param_length = htons(aph->ph.param_length);
2703 aap->addrp.ph.param_type = htons(aap->addrp.ph.param_type);
2704 aap->addrp.ph.param_length = htons(aap->addrp.ph.param_length);
2705
2706 SCTP_BUF_LEN(m_asconf) += SCTP_SIZE32(p_length);
2707 ptr += SCTP_SIZE32(p_length);
2708
2709 /*
2710 * these params are removed off the pending list upon
2711 * getting an ASCONF-ACK back from the peer, just set flag
2712 */
2713 aa->sent = 1;
2714 }
2715 /* check to see if the lookup addr has been populated yet */
2716 if (lookup_used == 0) {
2717 /* NOTE: if the address param is optional, can skip this... */
2718 /* add any valid (existing) address... */
2719 struct sctp_ipv6addr_param *lookup;
2720 uint16_t p_size, addr_size;
2721 struct sockaddr *found_addr;
2722 caddr_t addr_ptr;
2723
2724 if (stcb->sctp_ep->sctp_flags & SCTP_PCB_FLAGS_BOUNDALL)
2725 found_addr = sctp_find_valid_localaddr(stcb,
2726 addr_locked);
2727 else
2728 found_addr = sctp_find_valid_localaddr_ep(stcb);
2729
2730 lookup = (struct sctp_ipv6addr_param *)lookup_ptr;
2731 if (found_addr != NULL) {
2732 switch (found_addr->sa_family) {
2733#ifdef INET6
2734 case AF_INET6:
2735 /* copy IPv6 address */
2736 lookup->ph.param_type =
2737 htons(SCTP_IPV6_ADDRESS);
2738 p_size = sizeof(struct sctp_ipv6addr_param);
2739 addr_size = sizeof(struct in6_addr);
2740 addr_ptr = (caddr_t)&((struct sockaddr_in6 *)
2741 found_addr)->sin6_addr;
2742 break;
2743#endif
2744#ifdef INET
2745 case AF_INET:
2746 /* copy IPv4 address */
2747 lookup->ph.param_type =
2748 htons(SCTP_IPV4_ADDRESS);
2749 p_size = sizeof(struct sctp_ipv4addr_param);
2750 addr_size = sizeof(struct in_addr);
2751 addr_ptr = (caddr_t)&((struct sockaddr_in *)
2752 found_addr)->sin_addr;
2753 break;
2754#endif
2755 default:
2756 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_ASCONF1,
2757 "sctp_compose_asconf: no usable lookup addr (family = %d)!\n",
2758 found_addr->sa_family);
2759 sctp_m_freem(m_asconf_chk);
2760 sctp_m_freem(m_asconf);
2761 return (NULL);
2762 }
2763 lookup->ph.param_length = htons(SCTP_SIZE32(p_size));
2764 memcpy(lookup->addr, addr_ptr, addr_size);
2765 SCTP_BUF_LEN(m_asconf_chk) += SCTP_SIZE32(p_size);
2766 } else {
2767 /* uh oh... don't have any address?? */
2768 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_ASCONF1,
2769 "sctp_compose_asconf: no lookup addr!\n");
2770 sctp_m_freem(m_asconf_chk);
2771 sctp_m_freem(m_asconf);
2772 return (NULL);
2773 }
2774 }
2775 /* chain it all together */
2776 SCTP_BUF_NEXT(m_asconf_chk) = m_asconf;
2777 *retlen = SCTP_BUF_LEN(m_asconf_chk) + SCTP_BUF_LEN(m_asconf);
2778 acp->ch.chunk_length = htons(*retlen);
2779
2780 return (m_asconf_chk);
2781}
2782
2783/*
2784 * section to handle address changes before an association is up eg. changes
2785 * during INIT/INIT-ACK/COOKIE-ECHO handshake
2786 */
2787
2788/*
2789 * processes the (local) addresses in the INIT-ACK chunk
2790 */
2791static void
2792sctp_process_initack_addresses(struct sctp_tcb *stcb, struct mbuf *m,
2793 unsigned int offset, unsigned int length)
2794{
2795 struct sctp_paramhdr tmp_param, *ph;
2796 uint16_t plen, ptype;
2797 struct sctp_ifa *sctp_ifa;
2798 union sctp_sockstore store;
2799#ifdef INET6
2800 struct sctp_ipv6addr_param addr6_store;
2801#endif
2802#ifdef INET
2803 struct sctp_ipv4addr_param addr4_store;
2804#endif
2805
2806 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_ASCONF2, "processing init-ack addresses\n");
2807 if (stcb == NULL) /* Un-needed check for SA */
2808 return;
2809
2810 /* convert to upper bound */
2811 length += offset;
2812
2813 if ((offset + sizeof(struct sctp_paramhdr)) > length) {
2814 return;
2815 }
2816 /* go through the addresses in the init-ack */
2817 ph = (struct sctp_paramhdr *)
2818 sctp_m_getptr(m, offset, sizeof(struct sctp_paramhdr),
2819 (uint8_t *)&tmp_param);
2820 while (ph != NULL) {
2821 ptype = ntohs(ph->param_type);
2822 plen = ntohs(ph->param_length);
2823 switch (ptype) {
2824#ifdef INET6
2825 case SCTP_IPV6_ADDRESS:
2826 {
2827 struct sctp_ipv6addr_param *a6p;
2828
2829 /* get the entire IPv6 address param */
2830 a6p = (struct sctp_ipv6addr_param *)
2831 sctp_m_getptr(m, offset,
2832 sizeof(struct sctp_ipv6addr_param),
2833 (uint8_t *)&addr6_store);
2834 if (plen != sizeof(struct sctp_ipv6addr_param) ||
2835 a6p == NULL) {
2836 return;
2837 }
2838 memset(&store, 0, sizeof(union sctp_sockstore));
2839 store.sin6.sin6_family = AF_INET6;
2840#ifdef HAVE_SIN6_LEN
2841 store.sin6.sin6_len = sizeof(struct sockaddr_in6);
2842#endif
2843 store.sin6.sin6_port = stcb->rport;
2844 memcpy(&store.sin6.sin6_addr, a6p->addr, sizeof(struct in6_addr));
2845 break;
2846 }
2847#endif
2848#ifdef INET
2849 case SCTP_IPV4_ADDRESS:
2850 {
2851 struct sctp_ipv4addr_param *a4p;
2852
2853 /* get the entire IPv4 address param */
2854 a4p = (struct sctp_ipv4addr_param *)sctp_m_getptr(m, offset,
2855 sizeof(struct sctp_ipv4addr_param),
2856 (uint8_t *)&addr4_store);
2857 if (plen != sizeof(struct sctp_ipv4addr_param) ||
2858 a4p == NULL) {
2859 return;
2860 }
2861 memset(&store, 0, sizeof(union sctp_sockstore));
2862 store.sin.sin_family = AF_INET;
2863#ifdef HAVE_SIN_LEN
2864 store.sin.sin_len = sizeof(struct sockaddr_in);
2865#endif
2866 store.sin.sin_port = stcb->rport;
2867 store.sin.sin_addr.s_addr = a4p->addr;
2868 break;
2869 }
2870#endif
2871 default:
2872 goto next_addr;
2873 }
2874
2875 /* see if this address really (still) exists */
2876 sctp_ifa = sctp_find_ifa_by_addr(&store.sa, stcb->asoc.vrf_id,
2877 SCTP_ADDR_NOT_LOCKED);
2878 if (sctp_ifa == NULL) {
2879 /* address doesn't exist anymore */
2880 int status;
2881
2882 /* are ASCONFs allowed ? */
2883 if ((sctp_is_feature_on(stcb->sctp_ep,
2884 SCTP_PCB_FLAGS_DO_ASCONF)) &&
2885 stcb->asoc.asconf_supported) {
2886 /* queue an ASCONF DEL_IP_ADDRESS */
2887 status = sctp_asconf_queue_sa_delete(stcb, &store.sa);
2888 /*
2889 * if queued ok, and in correct state, send
2890 * out the ASCONF.
2891 */
2892 if (status == 0 &&
2893 SCTP_GET_STATE(stcb) == SCTP_STATE_OPEN) {
2894#ifdef SCTP_TIMER_BASED_ASCONF
2895 sctp_timer_start(SCTP_TIMER_TYPE_ASCONF,
2896 stcb->sctp_ep, stcb,
2897 stcb->asoc.primary_destination);
2898#else
2899 sctp_send_asconf(stcb, NULL, SCTP_ADDR_NOT_LOCKED);
2900#endif
2901 }
2902 }
2903 }
2904
2905next_addr:
2906 /*
2907 * Sanity check: Make sure the length isn't 0, otherwise
2908 * we'll be stuck in this loop for a long time...
2909 */
2910 if (SCTP_SIZE32(plen) == 0) {
2911 SCTP_PRINTF("process_initack_addrs: bad len (%d) type=%xh\n",
2912 plen, ptype);
2913 return;
2914 }
2915 /* get next parameter */
2916 offset += SCTP_SIZE32(plen);
2917 if ((offset + sizeof(struct sctp_paramhdr)) > length)
2918 return;
2919 ph = (struct sctp_paramhdr *)sctp_m_getptr(m, offset,
2920 sizeof(struct sctp_paramhdr), (uint8_t *)&tmp_param);
2921 } /* while */
2922}
2923
2924/* FIX ME: need to verify return result for v6 address type if v6 disabled */
2925/*
2926 * checks to see if a specific address is in the initack address list returns
2927 * 1 if found, 0 if not
2928 */
2929static uint32_t
2930sctp_addr_in_initack(struct mbuf *m, uint32_t offset, uint32_t length, struct sockaddr *sa)
2931{
2932 struct sctp_paramhdr tmp_param, *ph;
2933 uint16_t plen, ptype;
2934#ifdef INET
2935 struct sockaddr_in *sin;
2936 struct sctp_ipv4addr_param *a4p;
2937 struct sctp_ipv6addr_param addr4_store;
2938#endif
2939#ifdef INET6
2940 struct sockaddr_in6 *sin6;
2941 struct sctp_ipv6addr_param *a6p;
2942 struct sctp_ipv6addr_param addr6_store;
2943#ifdef SCTP_EMBEDDED_V6_SCOPE
2944 struct sockaddr_in6 sin6_tmp;
2945#endif
2946#endif
2947
2948 switch (sa->sa_family) {
2949#ifdef INET
2950 case AF_INET:
2951 break;
2952#endif
2953#ifdef INET6
2954 case AF_INET6:
2955 break;
2956#endif
2957 default:
2958 return (0);
2959 }
2960
2961 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_ASCONF2, "find_initack_addr: starting search for ");
2962 SCTPDBG_ADDR(SCTP_DEBUG_ASCONF2, sa);
2963 /* convert to upper bound */
2964 length += offset;
2965
2966 if ((offset + sizeof(struct sctp_paramhdr)) > length) {
2967 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_ASCONF1,
2968 "find_initack_addr: invalid offset?\n");
2969 return (0);
2970 }
2971 /* go through the addresses in the init-ack */
2972 ph = (struct sctp_paramhdr *)sctp_m_getptr(m, offset,
2973 sizeof(struct sctp_paramhdr), (uint8_t *) & tmp_param);
2974 while (ph != NULL) {
2975 ptype = ntohs(ph->param_type);
2976 plen = ntohs(ph->param_length);
2977 switch (ptype) {
2978#ifdef INET6
2979 case SCTP_IPV6_ADDRESS:
2980 if (sa->sa_family == AF_INET6) {
2981 /* get the entire IPv6 address param */
2982 if (plen != sizeof(struct sctp_ipv6addr_param)) {
2983 break;
2984 }
2985 /* get the entire IPv6 address param */
2986 a6p = (struct sctp_ipv6addr_param *)
2987 sctp_m_getptr(m, offset,
2988 sizeof(struct sctp_ipv6addr_param),
2989 (uint8_t *)&addr6_store);
2990 if (a6p == NULL) {
2991 return (0);
2992 }
2993 sin6 = (struct sockaddr_in6 *)sa;
2994#ifdef SCTP_EMBEDDED_V6_SCOPE
2995 if (IN6_IS_SCOPE_LINKLOCAL(&sin6->sin6_addr)) {
2996 /* create a copy and clear scope */
2997 memcpy(&sin6_tmp, sin6,
2998 sizeof(struct sockaddr_in6));
2999 sin6 = &sin6_tmp;
3000 in6_clearscope(&sin6->sin6_addr);
3001 }
3002#endif /* SCTP_EMBEDDED_V6_SCOPE */
3003 if (memcmp(&sin6->sin6_addr, a6p->addr,
3004 sizeof(struct in6_addr)) == 0) {
3005 /* found it */
3006 return (1);
3007 }
3008 }
3009 break;
3010#endif /* INET6 */
3011#ifdef INET
3012 case SCTP_IPV4_ADDRESS:
3013 if (sa->sa_family == AF_INET) {
3014 if (plen != sizeof(struct sctp_ipv4addr_param)) {
3015 break;
3016 }
3017 /* get the entire IPv4 address param */
3018 a4p = (struct sctp_ipv4addr_param *)
3019 sctp_m_getptr(m, offset,
3020 sizeof(struct sctp_ipv4addr_param),
3021 (uint8_t *)&addr4_store);
3022 if (a4p == NULL) {
3023 return (0);
3024 }
3025 sin = (struct sockaddr_in *)sa;
3026 if (sin->sin_addr.s_addr == a4p->addr) {
3027 /* found it */
3028 return (1);
3029 }
3030 }
3031 break;
3032#endif
3033 default:
3034 break;
3035 }
3036 /* get next parameter */
3037 offset += SCTP_SIZE32(plen);
3038 if (offset + sizeof(struct sctp_paramhdr) > length) {
3039 return (0);
3040 }
3041 ph = (struct sctp_paramhdr *)
3042 sctp_m_getptr(m, offset, sizeof(struct sctp_paramhdr),
3043 (uint8_t *) & tmp_param);
3044 } /* while */
3045 /* not found! */
3046 return (0);
3047}
3048
3049/*
3050 * makes sure that the current endpoint local addr list is consistent with
3051 * the new association (eg. subset bound, asconf allowed) adds addresses as
3052 * necessary
3053 */
3054static void
3055sctp_check_address_list_ep(struct sctp_tcb *stcb, struct mbuf *m, int offset,
3056 int length, struct sockaddr *init_addr)
3057{
3058 struct sctp_laddr *laddr;
3059
3060 /* go through the endpoint list */
3061 LIST_FOREACH(laddr, &stcb->sctp_ep->sctp_addr_list, sctp_nxt_addr) {
3062 /* be paranoid and validate the laddr */
3063 if (laddr->ifa == NULL) {
3064 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_ASCONF1,
3065 "check_addr_list_ep: laddr->ifa is NULL");
3066 continue;
3067 }
3068 /* do i have it implicitly? */
3069 if (sctp_cmpaddr(&laddr->ifa->address.sa, init_addr)) {
3070 continue;
3071 }
3072 /* check to see if in the init-ack */
3073 if (!sctp_addr_in_initack(m, offset, length, &laddr->ifa->address.sa)) {
3074 /* try to add it */
3075 sctp_addr_mgmt_assoc(stcb->sctp_ep, stcb, laddr->ifa,
3076 SCTP_ADD_IP_ADDRESS, SCTP_ADDR_NOT_LOCKED);
3077 }
3078 }
3079}
3080
3081/*
3082 * makes sure that the current kernel address list is consistent with the new
3083 * association (with all addrs bound) adds addresses as necessary
3084 */
3085static void
3086sctp_check_address_list_all(struct sctp_tcb *stcb, struct mbuf *m, int offset,
3087 int length, struct sockaddr *init_addr,
3088 uint16_t local_scope, uint16_t site_scope,
3089 uint16_t ipv4_scope, uint16_t loopback_scope)
3090{
3091 struct sctp_vrf *vrf = NULL;
3092 struct sctp_ifn *sctp_ifn;
3093 struct sctp_ifa *sctp_ifa;
3094 uint32_t vrf_id;
3095#ifdef INET
3096 struct sockaddr_in *sin;
3097#endif
3098#ifdef INET6
3099 struct sockaddr_in6 *sin6;
3100#endif
3101
3102 if (stcb) {
3103 vrf_id = stcb->asoc.vrf_id;
3104 } else {
3105 return;
3106 }
3107 SCTP_IPI_ADDR_RLOCK();
3108 vrf = sctp_find_vrf(vrf_id);
3109 if (vrf == NULL) {
3110 SCTP_IPI_ADDR_RUNLOCK();
3111 return;
3112 }
3113 /* go through all our known interfaces */
3114 LIST_FOREACH(sctp_ifn, &vrf->ifnlist, next_ifn) {
3115 if (loopback_scope == 0 && SCTP_IFN_IS_IFT_LOOP(sctp_ifn)) {
3116 /* skip loopback interface */
3117 continue;
3118 }
3119 /* go through each interface address */
3120 LIST_FOREACH(sctp_ifa, &sctp_ifn->ifalist, next_ifa) {
3121 /* do i have it implicitly? */
3122 if (sctp_cmpaddr(&sctp_ifa->address.sa, init_addr)) {
3123 continue;
3124 }
3125 switch (sctp_ifa->address.sa.sa_family) {
3126#ifdef INET
3127 case AF_INET:
3128 sin = &sctp_ifa->address.sin;
3129#if defined(__FreeBSD__) && !defined(__Userspace__)
3130 if (prison_check_ip4(stcb->sctp_ep->ip_inp.inp.inp_cred,
3131 &sin->sin_addr) != 0) {
3132 continue;
3133 }
3134#endif
3135 if ((ipv4_scope == 0) &&
3136 (IN4_ISPRIVATE_ADDRESS(&sin->sin_addr))) {
3137 /* private address not in scope */
3138 continue;
3139 }
3140 break;
3141#endif
3142#ifdef INET6
3143 case AF_INET6:
3144 sin6 = &sctp_ifa->address.sin6;
3145#if defined(__FreeBSD__) && !defined(__Userspace__)
3146 if (prison_check_ip6(stcb->sctp_ep->ip_inp.inp.inp_cred,
3147 &sin6->sin6_addr) != 0) {
3148 continue;
3149 }
3150#endif
3151 if ((local_scope == 0) &&
3152 (IN6_IS_ADDR_LINKLOCAL(&sin6->sin6_addr))) {
3153 continue;
3154 }
3155 if ((site_scope == 0) &&
3156 (IN6_IS_ADDR_SITELOCAL(&sin6->sin6_addr))) {
3157 continue;
3158 }
3159 break;
3160#endif
3161 default:
3162 break;
3163 }
3164 /* check to see if in the init-ack */
3165 if (!sctp_addr_in_initack(m, offset, length, &sctp_ifa->address.sa)) {
3166 /* try to add it */
3167 sctp_addr_mgmt_assoc(stcb->sctp_ep, stcb,
3168 sctp_ifa, SCTP_ADD_IP_ADDRESS,
3169 SCTP_ADDR_LOCKED);
3170 }
3171 } /* end foreach ifa */
3172 } /* end foreach ifn */
3173 SCTP_IPI_ADDR_RUNLOCK();
3174}
3175
3176/*
3177 * validates an init-ack chunk (from a cookie-echo) with current addresses
3178 * adds addresses from the init-ack into our local address list, if needed
3179 * queues asconf adds/deletes addresses as needed and makes appropriate list
3180 * changes for source address selection m, offset: points to the start of the
3181 * address list in an init-ack chunk length: total length of the address
3182 * params only init_addr: address where my INIT-ACK was sent from
3183 */
3184void
3185sctp_check_address_list(struct sctp_tcb *stcb, struct mbuf *m, int offset,
3186 int length, struct sockaddr *init_addr,
3187 uint16_t local_scope, uint16_t site_scope,
3188 uint16_t ipv4_scope, uint16_t loopback_scope)
3189{
3190 /* process the local addresses in the initack */
3191 sctp_process_initack_addresses(stcb, m, offset, length);
3192
3193 if (stcb->sctp_ep->sctp_flags & SCTP_PCB_FLAGS_BOUNDALL) {
3194 /* bound all case */
3195 sctp_check_address_list_all(stcb, m, offset, length, init_addr,
3196 local_scope, site_scope, ipv4_scope, loopback_scope);
3197 } else {
3198 /* subset bound case */
3199 if (sctp_is_feature_on(stcb->sctp_ep,
3200 SCTP_PCB_FLAGS_DO_ASCONF)) {
3201 /* asconf's allowed */
3202 sctp_check_address_list_ep(stcb, m, offset, length,
3203 init_addr);
3204 }
3205 /* else, no asconfs allowed, so what we sent is what we get */
3206 }
3207}
3208
3209/*
3210 * sctp_bindx() support
3211 */
3212uint32_t
3213sctp_addr_mgmt_ep_sa(struct sctp_inpcb *inp, struct sockaddr *sa,
3214 uint32_t type, uint32_t vrf_id)
3215{
3216 struct sctp_ifa *ifa;
3217 struct sctp_laddr *laddr, *nladdr;
3218
3219#ifdef HAVE_SA_LEN
3220 if (sa->sa_len == 0) {
3221 SCTP_LTRACE_ERR_RET(inp, NULL, NULL, SCTP_FROM_SCTP_ASCONF, EINVAL);
3222 return (EINVAL);
3223 }
3224#endif
3225 if (type == SCTP_ADD_IP_ADDRESS) {
3226 /* For an add the address MUST be on the system */
3227 ifa = sctp_find_ifa_by_addr(sa, vrf_id, SCTP_ADDR_NOT_LOCKED);
3228 } else if (type == SCTP_DEL_IP_ADDRESS) {
3229 /* For a delete we need to find it in the inp */
3230 ifa = sctp_find_ifa_in_ep(inp, sa, SCTP_ADDR_NOT_LOCKED);
3231 } else {
3232 ifa = NULL;
3233 }
3234 if (ifa != NULL) {
3235 if (type == SCTP_ADD_IP_ADDRESS) {
3236 sctp_add_local_addr_ep(inp, ifa, type);
3237 } else if (type == SCTP_DEL_IP_ADDRESS) {
3238 if (inp->laddr_count < 2) {
3239 /* can't delete the last local address */
3240 SCTP_LTRACE_ERR_RET(inp, NULL, NULL, SCTP_FROM_SCTP_ASCONF, EINVAL);
3241 return (EINVAL);
3242 }
3243 LIST_FOREACH(laddr, &inp->sctp_addr_list,
3244 sctp_nxt_addr) {
3245 if (ifa == laddr->ifa) {
3246 /* Mark in the delete */
3247 laddr->action = type;
3248 }
3249 }
3250 }
3251 if (LIST_EMPTY(&inp->sctp_asoc_list)) {
3252 /*
3253 * There is no need to start the iterator if
3254 * the inp has no associations.
3255 */
3256 if (type == SCTP_DEL_IP_ADDRESS) {
3257 LIST_FOREACH_SAFE(laddr, &inp->sctp_addr_list, sctp_nxt_addr, nladdr) {
3258 if (laddr->ifa == ifa) {
3259 sctp_del_local_addr_ep(inp, ifa);
3260 }
3261 }
3262 }
3263 } else {
3264 struct sctp_asconf_iterator *asc;
3265 struct sctp_laddr *wi;
3266 int ret;
3267
3268 SCTP_MALLOC(asc, struct sctp_asconf_iterator *,
3269 sizeof(struct sctp_asconf_iterator),
3270 SCTP_M_ASC_IT);
3271 if (asc == NULL) {
3272 SCTP_LTRACE_ERR_RET(inp, NULL, NULL, SCTP_FROM_SCTP_ASCONF, ENOMEM);
3273 return (ENOMEM);
3274 }
3275 wi = SCTP_ZONE_GET(SCTP_BASE_INFO(ipi_zone_laddr), struct sctp_laddr);
3276 if (wi == NULL) {
3277 SCTP_FREE(asc, SCTP_M_ASC_IT);
3278 SCTP_LTRACE_ERR_RET(inp, NULL, NULL, SCTP_FROM_SCTP_ASCONF, ENOMEM);
3279 return (ENOMEM);
3280 }
3281 LIST_INIT(&asc->list_of_work);
3282 asc->cnt = 1;
3283 SCTP_INCR_LADDR_COUNT();
3284 wi->ifa = ifa;
3285 wi->action = type;
3286 atomic_add_int(&ifa->refcount, 1);
3287 LIST_INSERT_HEAD(&asc->list_of_work, wi, sctp_nxt_addr);
3288 ret = sctp_initiate_iterator(sctp_asconf_iterator_ep,
3289 sctp_asconf_iterator_stcb,
3290 sctp_asconf_iterator_ep_end,
3291 SCTP_PCB_ANY_FLAGS,
3292 SCTP_PCB_ANY_FEATURES,
3293 SCTP_ASOC_ANY_STATE,
3294 (void *)asc, 0,
3295 sctp_asconf_iterator_end, inp, 0);
3296 if (ret) {
3297 SCTP_PRINTF("Failed to initiate iterator for addr_mgmt_ep_sa\n");
3298 SCTP_LTRACE_ERR_RET(inp, NULL, NULL, SCTP_FROM_SCTP_ASCONF, EFAULT);
3299 sctp_asconf_iterator_end(asc, 0);
3300 return (EFAULT);
3301 }
3302 }
3303 return (0);
3304 } else {
3305 /* invalid address! */
3306 SCTP_LTRACE_ERR_RET(NULL, NULL, NULL, SCTP_FROM_SCTP_ASCONF, EADDRNOTAVAIL);
3307 return (EADDRNOTAVAIL);
3308 }
3309}
3310
3311void
3312sctp_asconf_send_nat_state_update(struct sctp_tcb *stcb, struct sctp_nets *net)
3313{
3314 struct sctp_asconf_addr *aa_vtag, *aa_add, *aa_del;
3315 struct sctp_ifa *sctp_ifap;
3316 struct sctp_asconf_tag_param *vtag;
3317#ifdef INET
3318 struct sockaddr_in *to;
3319#endif
3320#ifdef INET6
3321 struct sockaddr_in6 *to6;
3322#endif
3323
3324 if (net == NULL) {
3325 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_ASCONF1, "sctp_asconf_send_nat_state_update: Missing net\n");
3326 return;
3327 }
3328 if (stcb == NULL) {
3329 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_ASCONF1, "sctp_asconf_send_nat_state_update: Missing stcb\n");
3330 return;
3331 }
3332 /* Need to have in the ASCONF:
3333 * - VTAG(my_vtag/peer_vtag)
3334 * - ADD(wildcard)
3335 * - DEL(wildcard)
3336 * - ADD(Any global addresses)
3337 */
3338 SCTP_MALLOC(aa_vtag, struct sctp_asconf_addr *, sizeof(struct sctp_asconf_addr), SCTP_M_ASC_ADDR);
3339 SCTP_MALLOC(aa_add, struct sctp_asconf_addr *, sizeof(struct sctp_asconf_addr), SCTP_M_ASC_ADDR);
3340 SCTP_MALLOC(aa_del, struct sctp_asconf_addr *, sizeof(struct sctp_asconf_addr), SCTP_M_ASC_ADDR);
3341
3342 if ((aa_vtag == NULL) || (aa_add == NULL) || (aa_del == NULL)) {
3343 /* Didn't get memory */
3344 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_ASCONF1, "sctp_asconf_send_nat_state_update: failed to get memory!\n");
3345out:
3346 if (aa_vtag != NULL) {
3347 SCTP_FREE(aa_vtag, SCTP_M_ASC_ADDR);
3348 }
3349 if (aa_add != NULL) {
3350 SCTP_FREE(aa_add, SCTP_M_ASC_ADDR);
3351 }
3352 if (aa_del != NULL) {
3353 SCTP_FREE(aa_del, SCTP_M_ASC_ADDR);
3354 }
3355 return;
3356 }
3357 memset(aa_vtag, 0, sizeof(struct sctp_asconf_addr));
3358 aa_vtag->special_del = 0;
3359 /* Fill in ASCONF address parameter fields. */
3360 /* Top level elements are "networked" during send. */
3361 aa_vtag->ifa = NULL;
3362 aa_vtag->sent = 0; /* clear sent flag */
3363 vtag = (struct sctp_asconf_tag_param *)&aa_vtag->ap.aph;
3364 vtag->aph.ph.param_type = SCTP_NAT_VTAGS;
3365 vtag->aph.ph.param_length = sizeof(struct sctp_asconf_tag_param);
3366 vtag->local_vtag = htonl(stcb->asoc.my_vtag);
3367 vtag->remote_vtag = htonl(stcb->asoc.peer_vtag);
3368
3369 memset(aa_add, 0, sizeof(struct sctp_asconf_addr));
3370 memset(aa_del, 0, sizeof(struct sctp_asconf_addr));
3371 switch (net->ro._l_addr.sa.sa_family) {
3372#ifdef INET
3373 case AF_INET:
3374 aa_add->ap.aph.ph.param_type = SCTP_ADD_IP_ADDRESS;
3375 aa_add->ap.aph.ph.param_length = sizeof(struct sctp_asconf_addrv4_param);
3376 aa_add->ap.addrp.ph.param_type = SCTP_IPV4_ADDRESS;
3377 aa_add->ap.addrp.ph.param_length = sizeof (struct sctp_ipv4addr_param);
3378 /* No need to fill the address, we are using 0.0.0.0 */
3379 aa_del->ap.aph.ph.param_type = SCTP_ADD_IP_ADDRESS;
3380 aa_del->ap.aph.ph.param_length = sizeof(struct sctp_asconf_addrv4_param);
3381 aa_del->ap.addrp.ph.param_type = SCTP_IPV4_ADDRESS;
3382 aa_del->ap.addrp.ph.param_length = sizeof (struct sctp_ipv4addr_param);
3383 /* No need to fill the address, we are using 0.0.0.0 */
3384 break;
3385#endif
3386#ifdef INET6
3387 case AF_INET6:
3388 aa_add->ap.aph.ph.param_type = SCTP_ADD_IP_ADDRESS;
3389 aa_add->ap.aph.ph.param_length = sizeof(struct sctp_asconf_addr_param);
3390 aa_add->ap.addrp.ph.param_type = SCTP_IPV6_ADDRESS;
3391 aa_add->ap.addrp.ph.param_length = sizeof (struct sctp_ipv6addr_param);
3392 /* No need to fill the address, we are using ::0 */
3393 aa_del->ap.aph.ph.param_type = SCTP_DEL_IP_ADDRESS;
3394 aa_del->ap.aph.ph.param_length = sizeof(struct sctp_asconf_addr_param);
3395 aa_del->ap.addrp.ph.param_type = SCTP_IPV6_ADDRESS;
3396 aa_del->ap.addrp.ph.param_length = sizeof (struct sctp_ipv6addr_param);
3397 /* No need to fill the address, we are using ::0 */
3398 break;
3399#endif
3400 default:
3401 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_ASCONF1,
3402 "sctp_asconf_send_nat_state_update: unknown address family %d\n",
3403 net->ro._l_addr.sa.sa_family);
3404 goto out;
3405 }
3406 TAILQ_INSERT_TAIL(&stcb->asoc.asconf_queue, aa_vtag, next);
3407 TAILQ_INSERT_TAIL(&stcb->asoc.asconf_queue, aa_add, next);
3408 TAILQ_INSERT_TAIL(&stcb->asoc.asconf_queue, aa_del, next);
3409
3410 /* Now we must hunt the addresses and add all global addresses */
3411 if (stcb->sctp_ep->sctp_flags & SCTP_PCB_FLAGS_BOUNDALL) {
3412 struct sctp_vrf *vrf = NULL;
3413 struct sctp_ifn *sctp_ifnp;
3414 uint32_t vrf_id;
3415
3416 vrf_id = stcb->sctp_ep->def_vrf_id;
3417 vrf = sctp_find_vrf(vrf_id);
3418 if (vrf == NULL) {
3419 goto skip_rest;
3420 }
3421
3422 SCTP_IPI_ADDR_RLOCK();
3423 LIST_FOREACH(sctp_ifnp, &vrf->ifnlist, next_ifn) {
3424 LIST_FOREACH(sctp_ifap, &sctp_ifnp->ifalist, next_ifa) {
3425 switch (sctp_ifap->address.sa.sa_family) {
3426#ifdef INET
3427 case AF_INET:
3428 to = &sctp_ifap->address.sin;
3429#if defined(__FreeBSD__) && !defined(__Userspace__)
3430 if (prison_check_ip4(stcb->sctp_ep->ip_inp.inp.inp_cred,
3431 &to->sin_addr) != 0) {
3432 continue;
3433 }
3434#endif
3435 if (IN4_ISPRIVATE_ADDRESS(&to->sin_addr)) {
3436 continue;
3437 }
3438 if (IN4_ISLOOPBACK_ADDRESS(&to->sin_addr)) {
3439 continue;
3440 }
3441 break;
3442#endif
3443#ifdef INET6
3444 case AF_INET6:
3445 to6 = &sctp_ifap->address.sin6;
3446#if defined(__FreeBSD__) && !defined(__Userspace__)
3447 if (prison_check_ip6(stcb->sctp_ep->ip_inp.inp.inp_cred,
3448 &to6->sin6_addr) != 0) {
3449 continue;
3450 }
3451#endif
3452 if (IN6_IS_ADDR_LOOPBACK(&to6->sin6_addr)) {
3453 continue;
3454 }
3455 if (IN6_IS_ADDR_LINKLOCAL(&to6->sin6_addr)) {
3456 continue;
3457 }
3458 break;
3459#endif
3460 default:
3461 continue;
3462 }
3463 sctp_asconf_queue_mgmt(stcb, sctp_ifap, SCTP_ADD_IP_ADDRESS);
3464 }
3465 }
3466 SCTP_IPI_ADDR_RUNLOCK();
3467 } else {
3468 struct sctp_laddr *laddr;
3469
3470 LIST_FOREACH(laddr, &stcb->sctp_ep->sctp_addr_list, sctp_nxt_addr) {
3471 if (laddr->ifa == NULL) {
3472 continue;
3473 }
3474 if (laddr->ifa->localifa_flags & SCTP_BEING_DELETED)
3475 /* Address being deleted by the system, dont
3476 * list.
3477 */
3478 continue;
3479 if (laddr->action == SCTP_DEL_IP_ADDRESS) {
3480 /* Address being deleted on this ep
3481 * don't list.
3482 */
3483 continue;
3484 }
3485 sctp_ifap = laddr->ifa;
3486 switch (sctp_ifap->address.sa.sa_family) {
3487#ifdef INET
3488 case AF_INET:
3489 to = &sctp_ifap->address.sin;
3490 if (IN4_ISPRIVATE_ADDRESS(&to->sin_addr)) {
3491 continue;
3492 }
3493 if (IN4_ISLOOPBACK_ADDRESS(&to->sin_addr)) {
3494 continue;
3495 }
3496 break;
3497#endif
3498#ifdef INET6
3499 case AF_INET6:
3500 to6 = &sctp_ifap->address.sin6;
3501 if (IN6_IS_ADDR_LOOPBACK(&to6->sin6_addr)) {
3502 continue;
3503 }
3504 if (IN6_IS_ADDR_LINKLOCAL(&to6->sin6_addr)) {
3505 continue;
3506 }
3507 break;
3508#endif
3509 default:
3510 continue;
3511 }
3512 sctp_asconf_queue_mgmt(stcb, sctp_ifap, SCTP_ADD_IP_ADDRESS);
3513 }
3514 }
3515 skip_rest:
3516 /* Now we must send the asconf into the queue */
3517 sctp_send_asconf(stcb, net, SCTP_ADDR_NOT_LOCKED);
3518}
